snippet.title: homebound | Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist homebound on steam now!

Tasked with finding humanity a new home, a lonely astronaut braves a desolate planet, making a fluffy friend along the way. homebound is a short 2D puzzle platformer that explores the feeling of home.

Play as the astronaut and the cat as they make their way through an abandoned planet.Prepare yourself to explore a mysteriously barren planet and find out why its inhabitants are all missing except for a lonesome cat, while delving into what feeling of home is.

#indiedev #homebound #games #indiedevelopment #indiedev #gaming
